name: Mirror Mysteries
storyline: A young family stops at a mysterious old home for a picnic and as the mother closes her eyes to enjoy the sun, she hears a horrific crash, the kids! As she enters the house, she is confronted by a mystical mirror thats taken her kids and locks them away in a magical world. A Hidden Object quest is placed upon you to not just save the children, but to help a unique character in very mystical places! Can you solve the Mirror Mysteries!?
summary:
Gaze into the looking glass! On a quiet family outing, two children have been trapped by a mystical mirror after they inadvertently smashed a group of mirrors, putting them in an unbelievable situation. Restore the mystical mirrors and save the children! 
 
Help a young family overcome an unbelievable situation. 
Find hidden objects and repair a set of mystical mirrors. 
Travel to magical lands, fulfilling requests to obtain what you seek. 
Combine items that will help solve puzzling situations.
